amendment.description: At the end of title VI, add the following (and amend the table of contents accordingly): SEC. __X. SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES ON ACQUISITIONS CONDUCTED UNDER THE GENERAL SERVICES ADMINISTRATION'S FEDERAL SUPPLY SCHEDULE. (a) FINDINGS.--Congress finds the following: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-407 to state that it is the sense of the House that small business set-asides should not be excluded from any acquisitions under the GSA's Federal Supply Schedule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Mica.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
